comments.content:
Resume All: [Sail Ltt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072631/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/sail)  
education: could be [Carolyna Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072631/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black) by Emily 'Lime' Conners
Wow, thanks so much! I'm saddened to know the second one is so expensive, but maybe I can work a deal with my employer :)
